ping.description: A simple ping. The Gateway should pretend to contact the satellite and return a pong.

all_transitions.description: This command will go through all of the possible command states. Watch the Communications panel on the dashboard to see the changes.

ping_through_leaf_network.description: Commands the Gateway to send a ping through the Leaf Groundstation Network. If credentials are properly configured for the Leaf sandbox, it will echo back.

telemetry.description: Commands the spacecraft to beacon Health and Status Telemetry. After executing this command, you can see the telemetry by navigating to the Analytics Page

error.description: Always errors to show the error process.

update_file_list.description: Gets the latest list of downloadable files from the spacecraft.

uplink_file.description: Uplink a file from your computer to the spacecraft.

downlink_file.description: Downlink an image from the Spacecraft.

connect.description: Points antennas and starts broadcasting carrier signal to establish RF lock with the spacecraft.

safemode.description: Commands the spacecraft into safemode, shutting down all non-essential systems.

plenty_o_fields.display_name: This command has many different fields
